dmca.title: Attention: Ms Andrea Almeida - TAKE DOWN NOTICE REQUEST
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Stange, Ross [mailto:Ross.Stange@sage.com] 
Posted At: Sunday, November 19, 2006 7:12 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Attention: Ms Andrea Almeida - TAKE DOWN NOTICE REQUEST
Subject: Attention: Ms Andrea Almeida - TAKE DOWN NOTICE REQUEST
Importance: High


Dear Ms Almeida,
 
Please find attached a take down notice request for a website hosted by
GL Computing.  
 
Please note this request is being made on on the basis of infringed use
of copyright material owned by Sage regarding the ACT! product.
 
If you have any questions in relation to this please contact me
directly.
 
Regards,
 
Ross Stange 
Chief Operating Officer
 
 
 
Sage Business Solutions Pty Ltd

D: +61 3 8681 3410
F: +61 3 8681 3455
M: +61 417 725 375 
        
         
Visit our new website: www.sagebusiness.com.au
<http://www.sagebusiness.com.au/>          
Disclaimer: This email is confidential and intended only for the use of
the individual or entity named above and may contain information that is
privileged. If you are not the intended recipient, you are notified that
any dissemination, distribution or copying of this email is strictly
prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please notify us
immediately by return email or telephone and destroy the original
message. Thankyou
